page.title: 05Tourist Accommodation
page.content: One of the biggest hotels in Torquay is The Imperial which was opened in 1863 marking a great change in tourist accommodation.It was the first large hotel and the first to be built on the edge of a cliff.It is now a five star hotel.Another famous hotel is The Palace.It is called The Palace because it was The Bishop of Exeter's own home.In 1942 it was used as a hospital for wounded R.A.F Officers.People say there were many casualties from bombing but no details were ever given.The Palace is a four star hotel with many sporting activities for tourist and businessmen It is used for conferences and trade fairs.Many of the big houses in the area have been turned into boarding houses or hotels offering bead and breakfast and an optional evening meal.
